com.st.st25sdk.command

Interface Type1CommandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Type1Command

    public interface Type1CommandInterface
    Defines the common methods to be implemented to build NFC Forum Type1 commands

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getHr0Hr1()
      Get the HR0 and HR1 bytes describing Type1 Tag memory structure
      byte[] getUidLSB()
      Get the 4 LSB of the UID
      byte[] rall(byte[] uidLSB)
      RALL command (Read All command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0 Send back HR0 and HR1 followed by the whole memory content from blocks 0x0 to 0xE
      byte[] read(byte add, byte[] uidLSB)
      READ command (Read command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] read8(byte add8, byte[] uidLSB)
      READ8 command (Read eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] reqA()
      SENS_REQ command (REQA command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send the ReqA command (command code 0x26)
      byte[] rid()
      rid command (Read Identifier command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send back HR0/HR1 (Header metal-mask ROM) and four least significant UID bytes from Block 0
      byte[] rseg(byte adds, byte[] uidLSB)
      RSEG command (Read Segment command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] selectType1Tag()
      Send reqA + rid + rall commands to get the 7 bytes UID and select tag
      void writeErase(byte add, byte data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-E command (Write Erase command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      void writeErase8(byte add8, byte[] data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-E8 command (Write Erase eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      void writeNoErase(byte add, byte data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-NE command (Write No Erase command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      void writeNoErase8(byte add8, byte[] data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-NE8 command (Write No Erase eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] wupA()
      ALL_REQ command (WUPA command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send the WupA command (command code 0x52)

    • Method Detail

      • reqA

        byte[] reqA()
     throws STException
        SENS_REQ command (REQA command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send the ReqA command (command code 0x26)
        Returns:
        ATQA0 ATQA1 tag response
        Throws:
        STException

      • wupA

        byte[] wupA()
     throws STException
        ALL_REQ command (WUPA command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send the WupA command (command code 0x52)
        Returns:
        ATQA0 ATQA1 tag response
        Throws:
        STException

      • rid

        byte[] rid()
    throws STException
        rid command (Read Identifier command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send back HR0/HR1 (Header metal-mask ROM) and four least significant UID bytes from Block 0
        Returns:
        HR0 HR1 and uidLSB (UID0 UID1 UID2 UID3) tag response
        Throws:
        STException

      • rall

        byte[] rall(byte[] uidLSB)
     throws STException
        RALL command (Read All command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0 Send back HR0 and HR1 followed by the whole memory content from blocks 0x0 to 0xE
        Parameters:
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        HR0 and HR1 followed by the whole memory content from blocks 0x0 to 0xE
        Throws:
        STException

      • read

        byte[] read(byte add,
            byte[] uidLSB)
     throws STException
        READ command (Read command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        add - address of the byte to be read (b8:0 b7654:Static Block(0x0-0xE) b321:byte (0-7))
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        add and data byte
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeErase

        void writeErase(byte add,
                byte data,
                byte[] uidLSB)
         throws STException
        WRITE-E command (Write Erase command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        add - address of the byte to be read (b8:0 b7654:Static Block(0h-Eh) b321:byte (0-7))
        data - byte data to be written
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeNoErase

        void writeNoErase(byte add,
                  byte data,
                  byte[] uidLSB)
           throws STException
        WRITE-NE command (Write No Erase command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        add - address of the byte to be read (b8:0 b7654:Static Block(0h-Eh) b321:byte (0-7))
        data - byte data to be written
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Throws:
        STException

      • rseg

        byte[] rseg(byte adds,
            byte[] uidLSB)
     throws STException
        RSEG command (Read Segment command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        adds - address of the byte to be read (b8765:Segment b4321:0000)
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        adds + data bytes (131 response bytes)
        Throws:
        STException

      • read8

        byte[] read8(byte add8,
             byte[] uidLSB)
      throws STException
        READ8 command (Read eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        add8 - address of the byte to be read (b87654321:Global block)
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        add8 + 8 data bytes
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeErase8

        void writeErase8(byte add8,
                 byte[] data,
                 byte[] uidLSB)
          throws STException
        WRITE-E8 command (Write Erase eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        add8 - address of the byte to be read (b87654321:Global block)
        data - array of 8 bytes to be written
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeNoErase8

        void writeNoErase8(byte add8,
                   byte[] data,
                   byte[] uidLSB)
            throws STException
        WRITE-NE8 command (Write No Erase eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Parameters:
        add8 - address of the byte to be read (b87654321:Global block)
        data - array of 8 bytes to be written
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Throws:
        STException

      • getHr0Hr1

        byte[] getHr0Hr1()
          throws STException
        Get the HR0 and HR1 bytes describing Type1 Tag memory structure
        Returns:
        HR0 and HR1
        Throws:
        STException

      • getUidLSB

        byte[] getUidLSB()
          throws STException
        Get the 4 LSB of the UID
        Returns:
        4 Lsb's UID
        Throws:
        STException

      • selectType1Tag

        byte[] selectType1Tag()
               throws STException
        Send reqA + rid + rall commands to get the 7 bytes UID and select tag
        Returns:
        tag's UID
        Throws:
        STException
